name: Kappa Clicker (Voytec)
description:
Kappa clicker is a free game inspired on the popular clicker games

Click Kappa to earn Kappa. Buy emotes to earn Kappa faster. Get users from prestige to get bonus and earn more Kappa.

Features:

  • 12 Emotes
  • 9 Upgrades
  • 140+ Achievements
  • Prestige System
  • Auto saving
  • Offline Progress

Write your ideas for the game in the comments and maybe I can add to the game.

If you found a bug please write it in comments.
